svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 62px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1px; margin-left: 145px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 50px; overflow: hidden; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

li.span: Sends bytes on the SPI bus

text-align: left;
text-align: left;
text-align: left;

li.span: Sets the CSN pin to LOW
Takes the array of data to write

ul.li:
Upon completion of data transfer,
sets CSN to HIGH

text-align: left;

ul.li:
Cache the register with write-only access by calling
tmc2660_cache.

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
